description: Detects PowerShell commands that decrypt an ".LNK" "file to drop the next stage of the malware.
author: X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: PowerShell Execution With Potential Decryption Capabilities
query: (process.executable.text:("*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe") AND winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll") AND process.command_line.text:("*Get\-ChildItem\ *" OR "*dir\ *" OR "*gci\ *" OR "*ls\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*Get\-Content\ *" OR "*gc\ *" OR "*cat\ *" OR "*type\ *") AND process.command_line.text:"*\ \^|\ *" AND process.command_line.text:"*\\*.lnk*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\-Recurse*" AND process.command_line.text:"*\-Skip\ *")
